title: Hallelujah
lyrics: Hallelujah
Brenton Brown | Brian Doerksen Tempo - 96 | Time - 4/4
VERSE 1
Your love is a - mazing steady and un - changing
Your love is a mountain firm beneath my feet
Your love is a myst'ry wow You gently lift me
When I am sur - rounded Your love carries me
CHORUS
Halle - lujah halle - lujah
Halle - lujah Your love makes me sing
Halle - lujah halle - lujah
Halle - lujah Your love makes me sing
VERSE 2
Your love is sur - prising I can feel it rising
All the joy that's growing deep inside of me
Ev'ry time I see You all Your goodness shines through
I can feel this God song rising up in me
INTERLUDE
Yes You make me sing
Lord You make me sing sing sing
How You make me sing
ENDING
Lord You make me sing
How You make me sing
CCLI Song # 3091812

raw_text:
Hallelujah
Key - E
Brenton Brown | Brian Doerksen Tempo - 96 | Time - 4/4
VERSE 1
E/G# A2
Your love is a - mazing steady and un - changing
Bsus A2
Your love is a mountain firm beneath my feet
E/G# A2
Your love is a myst'ry wow You gently lift me
Bsus A2
When I am sur - rounded Your love carries me
CHORUS
E Bsus
Halle - lujah halle - lujah
C#m7 A2
Halle - lujah Your love makes me sing
E Bsus
Halle - lujah halle - lujah
C#m7 A2
Halle - lujah Your love makes me sing
VERSE 2
E/G# A2
Your love is sur - prising I can feel it rising
Bsus A2
All the joy that's growing deep inside of me
E/G# A2
Ev'ry time I see You all Your goodness shines through
Bsus A2
I can feel this God song rising up in me
INTERLUDE
B C#m7
Yes You make me sing
B/D# A2
Lord You make me sing sing sing
B C#m7 B/D#
How You make me sing
ENDING
A2
Lord You make me sing
A2 E
How You make me sing
